```{r}
#loading in the packages :D
library(tidyverse)
library(sdmpredictors)
library(raster)
library(sp)
```

```{r}
#listing all of the different variables 
library(biooracler)

dataset <- list_layers()
dataset
```

```{r}
#trying to import the max ocean temperature
info_layer("thetao_baseline_2000_2019_depthmax") #looking at the layers of oceantemp max
dataset_id <- "thetao_baseline_2000_2019_depthmax"
latitude = c(-89.975, 89.975)
longitude = c(-179.975, 179.975)

constraints = list(latitude, longitude)
names(constraints) = c("latitude", "longitude")
variables = c("thetao_mean") #choosing the mean of the max temperature 
max_ocean_temp <- download_layers(dataset_id, variables, constraints)
```
```{r}
#try to load in the max temp raster to see if it works <- using the star package
library(stars)
ggplot() +
  geom_stars(data = max_ocean_temp) + #loading the raster data 
  coord_equal() + # making all the coordinates equal | makes x and y axis the same length
  theme_bw() + #giving it a black white theme
  scale_fill_viridis_c() #making the colors viridis 

```
